content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the back porch with neighbors when high in the sky, not around the horizon, there appeared what looked like a fireball with a tail that became increasing brighter falling. it then broke into three parts. after about 1 to 2 seconds 4 to 5 lights appeared. the lights flashed on and off and a few moved back and forth form left to right. the lights then disappeared. the event lasted form beginning to end about 5 to 7 minutes. my neighbor video taped the lights moving and flashing, but did not get the initial fireball.
content.summary: Observed fireball, then broke into smaller ones which flashed

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on a bench in batheaston facing south in the car park it was a cloudless night and we were deciding how to get home (we were camping at browns folly nature riserve but decided to leave after hearing gun shots ) i was looking at the stars like i always do. i was looking toward browns folly in direction but higher up, as my eyes were scanning the patch of sky my attenchen was taken by one star that became 3 lights creating a triangle shape ( pointed it out to companion) and moving thurther apart. at first the triangle was symmetrical then it tilted, as it tilted the lower points moved away from the top point and stayed close together then they flew around eachother, then i couldn't see them anymore so i looked for the top point and it was still there and stayed there. my companion says he could still see the other 2 that i thought had disappeared, as i looked where was pointed out to me i couldn't see them properly ( when i focused on them i could see them but at the same time i couldn't ) we sat there for a bit longer and i keeped trying to see the 2 lights but it was still the same so we left and as far as we know that is how it stayed.
content.summary: Looked like 3 stars, created triangle then flew apart making it bigger 2 danced round eachother, changed positioning then still

content.detailedDescription: Travelling north on hwy 9, i caught a glimpse of what i thought was a dust devil rising ahead and to my right at appr 300 yds distance. it seemed there was a white wal-mart bag rising within the dust devil until i  realized it was actually a silvery rectangular object i would describe as the size of a poster board. the object continued tumbling and rising to slightly above the tree line to appr 200 feet at which point it began to leisurely move west from the east towards the highway where i was driving north. this was when i moved over and stopped. during the next 6 min and 30 secs it crossed the highway and covered appr 3/4 mile then began to angle upwards at a 45% slope. it eventually diappeared behind the clouds. having flown extensively,i estimate the clouds to have been about 1000-1500 feet above the ground.   during this period there were 4-5 cars pass, but unwilling to lose visual contact, i didn't wave anyone down. the reason i am so precise about the time is i was low on gas and was watching gas gauge and clock to see if i could make it to next station.
content.summary: Watched shimmering silver rectangular object appear to tumble through the air moving from left to right until disappeared behind clouds after 6 minutes observation

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a bright orange ball of light in the night sky.  it was moving under the clouds during a brief sprinkle of rain.  it appeared to go off and on as it traveled northward but was under the clouds far enough that they would not have blocked the view.  as it traveled it flashed bright, then dim about 10 times, then just blinked out.  after about 5 seconds it appeared again briefly, then went out again.  the total time was 10-20 seconds.  it was traveling along the shoreline of lake huron.
content.summary: Bright orange ball of light flashing on and off then disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Black object on a linear upward trajectory heading north east over vancouver bc, canada. rear of object spinning clock wise and counter clock wise in a rhythmic pattern.
content.summary: Black object rear part rotating clock wise/counter clock wise in a rithmic pattern

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside staring at the stars i saw a starlike object flashing/ glowing randomly in the sky until it flew far enough away and i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: It was a ufo!

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to take pictures of the sky in the park next to my house. and while looking for my tripod i saw about 100 red lights over the horizon and and dissapearing into the cloud cover, was ale to get a semi blurred photo of about 4 red lights moving.
content.summary: 100's of re lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from a gas station at approximately 12:30am from slatington on walnut st just past lehigh st traveling south when i noticed a glowing dull light over a small development to my right. at first i thought it was just a firework but then realized it was hovering and moving very slowly. after looking closer it looked like a fireball floating through the sky just over the tree line. made no noise and moved very slowly. i turned up grove st and stopped near a corn field looking to my right to see if i could see it again, and it appeared to be hovering over the same area. i did not stick around any longer to see what it would do because i was a little freaked out.
content.summary: Appeared as fire or a dull light, floating north

content.detailedDescription: Standing on the beach near the boat launch on the north side of highland lake i observed from the north a red/orange glowing sphere like object rise from the hills and ascend above the low cloud cover and then begin to travel in straight line across the sky in a ne direction at which point it went behind the clouds not to return from the other side as would be expected/the cloudy area was a minimal region of the sky and stars could be seen clearly in the rest of the sky that was unobstructed/soon after an additional light also ascended from the same area and also showed the same behavior as the first object in an identical pattern and a few minutes later an identical object could be seen south of my location but much farther in the distance possiblt in torrington,this object was not seen leaving from the same area as the first two.These objects appeared as red/orange very bright pulsating lights
content.summary: 3 fireballs seen at highland lake

content.detailedDescription:
Outside my home in the front yard. looked up in the sky and seen bright orange round shape object. live near a airport about 3 miles away house is on the glide path of planes, watched them for years this object was no plane. 
it made absolutely no noise at all. it was not fireworks. it went straight north and then turned to the west and disappeared. it was amazing i never seen any craft of any kind that was solid bright orange and round shaped it just glowed in the night sky. it was awesome!!
content.summary: Bright orange object  heading north slow speed turned west

content.detailedDescription: Maybe there is others that may have seen the 2 super large lights in the night sky,that is what i really would like to know. it was years ago, it could have been 2004 but i am thinking that is was on a nice night in 2003.  i had gotten off work late at night, as i entered the outskirts of chino valley az, the sky was black and no moon any where in sight, and you could not even see any stars. as i was driving north along hwy 89 in the direction of paulden az,i looked to my left,(i think the light must have caught my eye) and above the hills there was 2 huge white lights, about twice the size the moon looks, sharp clear edges around the lights, no glare like from car lights, the space between the two lights would have fit one more the size of light.  there were no other cars on the road at the time, for about 10 minutes i would turn my head to see if the lights were still there, i would look at the road then turn to look at the lights, they never changed, just stayed in one place, i was trying to think of what it could be, at first i thought it might have been an airplane, then i thought maybe it was two helicopters but then there was on sound, it did not move, the size stayed the same. after about ten minutes i turned my head and it was gone, nowhere in sight, and it had only been a minute or less from the last time i saw it.  it was not long after the lights had gone that a car or 2 went by me.I was in aye, a ufo never really crossed my mind till i got home. i told my husband and about all he said was ya, so i just kind of dropped it from my mind.  but to this day i still watch the skies when out at night and even during the day my eyes turn to the sky.
content.summary: Two sharp white  hugh moon shape lights, at least twice the size of the moon, were very bright but no glare like car lights.

content.detailedDescription: While watching fireworks on the lake my daughter-in-law pointed out a stationary red light in the sky. at first sight i responded that it was more than likely a light from a tower but it was a bit peculiar since i had not seen it before. we watched it for about 20 minutes. while we watched, the light appeared to very slowly ascend a noticeable distance. the light resembled  a stoplight with a slight hourglass shape. it did not make any sudden movements and no noise could be heard due to fireworks and due to it's apparent distance from us. the object suddenly disappeared as if someone had turned out the light. we are located within thirty miles of a military base/camp. we were not scared...Only curious. we have had multiple friends share their sightings of similar lighted objects in the last few months.
content.summary: While watching fireworks on the lake my daughter-in-law pointed out a stationary red light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were shooting off fireworks in my back alley in illinois july 4th 2013 at approximately 10pm when we noticed a flaming/pulsating orange object in the sky moving from north to south in a straight line silently. my wife came home from work with 2 of her coworkers around 10:10pm and the 5 of us witnessed the object 2 more times moving in the same direction between 10-11, it would fly from north to south for about 2 minutes in our line of sight and then disappear into thin air, it was also accompanied by a single white dot of light flashing as it disappears. my friend recorded the orange light on his iphone 4s. my wife's coworker got a text message from her husband who was a few towns over saying he thought he saw a ufo, he described the same object we had all seen.  weather was fair. sky was clear. 

on july 6th 2013 at 9:37pm my wife and i noticed the orange object in the sky flying from southwest to northeast as we were walking up our back porch stairs in illinois, it was in our line of sight for about 2 min before disappearing into thin air, i was able to record multiple videos on my iphone 4 of the event, capturing the orange light and the small white flash of light accompanying the vanishing of the object. we went into the house to eat and came back outside to see the same orange object flying again from southwest to northeast and then vanishing after about 2 min, i recorded the event again on my phone,  about  30 minutes later we received a text from a friend saying they were looking at the object flying the same southwest to northeast pattern about 5 miles from my location, i could not see the object at this time. i sat outside for 30 more minutes and then went inside without seeing the object again. the weather was fair. sky was cloudy.
content.summary: Illinois flaming object in sky seen july 4th and july 6th multiple times by multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription: July 6th 2013 - 9:45 pm - i noticed a bright light in the sky while running for my afternoon exercise. it appeared at first to be a comet. i quickly realized what i was seeing was not a comet. after 15-20 seconds 3 other similar shapes and light follow. first forming a 3 light triangle with one of the objects being offset. then they form a straight line and each object fades in and out for about 1 minute to 1 minute and 30 seconds. after 3 minutes they fade out and do not reappear. 1:58 seconds was captured on video.
content.summary: July 6th 2013 one comet like light appears then 3 other similar shapes and ligths follow

content.detailedDescription:
Watching fireworks 10-15 miles away on the horizon. an extremely bright "firework" caught our eye and spiraled down toward the tree line (off in a great distance) then slowly rose up and traveled toward us. it was fluid and made no sound. looked very very bright, almost sun-colored. it traveled from the south toward us and got to what seemed a few hundred yards away before veering to our left (east) and traveled away. it never lost it's brightness and the incredible thing is that even thought the sky was lit up with stars, the only visible object is the ufo. no flashing plane lights etc. 5 people watched intently and were all freaked out before it finally traveled out of sight

i should also note that this the 4th sighting in this general era i've personally had and the 3rd with multiple witnesses. 3 were at night and 1 during the day

another note is that i,m highly educated, professional, sane, etc.  not a quack
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extremely brightly colored sphere that moved fluidly fast and silently

content.detailedDescription:
Friend and myself sitting in a field one night next to his house. all of a sudden there were two quick bright blue flashes that illuminated everything within view like daylight but a solid blue color. i was able to see a hill about a mile away like daylight when this happened. 

my friend was looking down and clearly remembers seeing the angle of the shadows being cast from the blades of grass by the blue flashes. because of this he knew the object wasn't directly above us but slightly off to the side some. 

we both instantly looked up out of instinct and above us was a large solid white orb completely stationary. it seemed close but due to being in the sky at night it was hard to judge actual distance. i always thought it was just under 100 feet off the ground but my friend thought more like 300 feet. i would give a visual estimate of size as around 9 full moons in the sky if that makes sense. 

the object was close enough that i could see almost like small red bands of electricity sparking around the skin of the object, almost as if it was shedding some form of excess static electricity. 

after a few seconds of not moving it shot off in an instant to one side. the speed of the movement left a large white tail behind, the width of the object itself, so it was rather wide in the sky. a second later the tail disappeared after the object, this was an incredible sight. it was like seeing the old enterprise enter warp speed the way the stars would streak past.

the orb itself was solid in color like looking at a white light bulb. it never fluctuated or dimmed this was definitely a solid object not ball lightning. i am a very logical person and i have searched and searched for other explanations since but there is nothing capable of the movements we witnessed. 

to me i have always felt like there were some key aspects to our sighting that may hold important clues. i feel the blue flashes have something to do with how the object got where it was sitting when we saw it. i know meteors and such cause those bright flashes  when entering a certain layer of our atmosphere. blue flashes from meteors are rarer but are caused from certain types of material make up being burned up on entry if i remember correctly. 

knowing that, and that what was in the sky above was not anything like a meteor since it was stationary, i believe the blue flashes were simply the effect of it entering our atmosphere. most likely any object entering our atmosphere at high speeds would cause some type of flash so i feel this fits. 

secondly the electrical sparking that snaked around the object at first seems important. there was only a little amount of this and it seemed to quickly dissipate. to me the object got to where it sat from wherever. which was like step one for it. then as it discharged excess energy it was also prepping for its next move, ie reached earth now prepping to move to next location.

anyways after it shot off we ran across town to another friends house who's dad was a local policeman. we new he was very interested in ufos so we wanted to let him know. he was pretty interested in what we had to say. the next day we ran into him again and he told us that there were many reports that night of people seeing the object around the general area. one couple even reported it following them as they drove down placer hills road that night and that they were very scared trying to get away from it.

i have seen my fair share of questionable things in the sky but i'm very skeptical even though i do believe in ufos and aliens. i have a few really special and unique experiences but even those don't hold a candle to the scope and clarity of this event. that's why i decided to share this. 

also i think it bears mentioning that the friend i was with seemed to be a magnet for ufo activity growing up. he is the most trustworthy person i know and he is almost always with people when he sees things so i hold his experiences as very credible. and unfortunately for him ufos and aliens terrify him, me i just want answers and as much real knowledge on the subject as i can find. this event for me made there no question about aliens. i know it's all on my word but this event did happen as i told, so if the event is looked at with an open mind i believe there may be some valuable info gained from what we witnessed. even now 15 or so years later i still think about that event daily, the details have been burned into my mind, and i wouldn't want it any other way, although i really really want to know who occupied the object.
content.summary: 2 huge blue flashes then a large solid orb above us, stationary then shot off

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio when i suddenly spotted a ufo. i t was moving along quite fast. the ufo was octagon shaped. it was copper and pulsated with light. it had 3-4 long tails hanging down. i called for my husband and he came out and managed to see it. we both realized it was more different than anything we have ever seen before in our entire lives! the ufo simply disappeared behind the trees.
content.summary: The ufo was octagon shaped. it was copper and pulsated with light. it had some long tails hanging down. i t was large.

content.detailedDescription: It was midnigght in warsaw, indiana and i had the blinds open so we could see the fireworks from our couch. i was watching and noticed a bright red/orange light but thought nothing of it. i glanced at our tv and watched somw of the show but out of the corner of my eye i noticed it hadn't burnt out like a fire work would. it was slowly moving south to north. it was lower than the clouds and was kind of wavy straight line and the light seemed to flicker or pulsing? i told my husband and he saw it too and went outside for a minute. the light kept going for about 2- 3 minutes and then it just disappeared. it was in our line of sight and vanished.
content.summary: It was about midnight and i had the blinds open to see the fireworks. i looked up from the couch and noticed a bright red orange light but i thought nothing of it at first because there were big fireworks. it kept going for about 2, 3 min

content.detailedDescription: Lights appeared in the southwest direction and began to form in a triangular formation, they faded out and reappeared in a straight, multiple eyewitness with video evidence
content.summary: Lights appeared and blinked on and off, similar to the phoenix 1997 sighting, multiple eyewitness with video evidence

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home heading north on norton road in ohio just came out of a town called darbydale, i noticed a bright light to my right. as soon as i noticed the light it split into two lights then three then four. they all started to move around in circles staying in the same area after o got stopped i tried ti get a picture of the lights and a recording with not much luck thats when they all formed a single light that was very bright.  it disappeared for a second then reappeared as a slightly reddish orange light then started moving away by now ita seems like im following it but it was also climbing in altitude and finally disappeared.
content.summary: One bright orb morphed into 4 flew around went back to one slightly changed color and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Have on video, reminiscent of phoenix lights
content.summary: 4 lights faded in and out

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around 11:30pm on friday night, in the suburb of glen cove, in vallejo, ca. there was a slight haze, so not many stars were visible at the time. i had been looking at two particularly bright lights, wondering which stars they were. they were north about 25 degrees off the horizon. i started looking forward, but they were still in my peripheral vision. as a light post passed between the lights and myself, one seemed to move behind the pole quicker than the other. i figured it was because i was walking, so i stopped to observe. this is when one of the lights started accelerating. i was confused at first because i didn't understand how i could have mistaken a satellite for a star. the initial speed was that of a satellite, but it only went a short distance before it doubled and then tripled, at least, the normal speed of a satellite. after it had traveled about 20 degrees along the horizon, it came to a complete and immediate stop. it then began to move higher in the sky and then stopped again. all this happened in less than 3 seconds. i started to wonder if the star that i thought stopped, was there all along and the original object just happened to disappear from sight around it. however, the second bright light i was originally observing, began moving in the same direction. it came to a stop just passed the first star and under it. just then a third light came into view forming a triangle with the other two. within a couple of minutes, two shooting stars sequentially took the same trajectory, and started at the same position the lights traveled. i assumed they were shooting stars because they appeared out of nowhere. i kept walking my dog looking up the whole time. about 15 minutes later, a third shooting star, same trajectory, same path. after i got home, i went out back to stargaze and about 30 minutes after the third shooting star, a fourth one did the same thing. the 3 lights remained in the same position until about 4, which is when i was finally able to fall asleep. for all i know, they are still there...
content.summary: 2 stars repositioning themselves. 4 identical shooting stars

content.detailedDescription: There were three round balls of bright white light in the formation of a triangle. spinning at a constant uniform speed. balls of light separated from formation and disappeared. preparing to watch firworks show at dicks sproting goods statium im commerce city co. object was above houses acroos the street from my location. i would say it was about the heigth of a high power tention line tower.
content.summary: There were three round balls of bright white light in the formation of a triangle. spinning at a constant uniform speed. balls of light separated from formation and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i work every day at four in the morning in a bar in encinitas. when we arrived, i did not notice the orb. normally, the sky is dark and there are no signs of stars because it is either too misty or too cloudy. nearby, there is a 7-11 where i get a cup of coffee. before i leave to get coffee, i do a bit of cleaning and head back to the car to retrieve the cup. when i went to get it, i noticed a faint display of colors, rotating in the sky. from the distance, it appeared to be a helicopter or an airplane, but there are no airports in the area. i brushed it off and opened the door to the car and grabbed the cup. when i looked back up, the lights had changed from orange to blue to white and so on. then i could make out a dark shape that seemed to be changing in shape. i didn't understand, so i went and told mom about it. she came out with me, thinking i was crazy. when she looked into the sky, all she said was "wow! what is that?" i didn't know what to tell her, but she took out her phone to take pictures. as dawn approached twilight, the shape was beginning to show more and more. shapeshifting, it was hard to make out what it was doing. below it, maybe some 20ft away, we saw a green light, blinking as if following it. through mom's phone, all we saw was the green light, but not the orb with the colors. we wondered for minutes what it meant. i took out my own phone, but the camera is old and it made out nothing. several times, we went back and forth, going in then coming back out to check up on it. not once did it move, even drift, so it couldn't be a balloon. an hour later, when twilight arrived, we made out a pure spherical object. it shone blue/black and there was a blinking white light under it, no longer in colors. it also appeared to be rotating, with little bumps on the sides. finally, sunrise, and i was able to take video with my camera but all you can see is a dot in the sky. today, july 6th, we went to work again but we saw no sign whatsoever of the orb.
content.summary: Black orb seen from distance without movement, appeared like balloon but flashed multiple colors before surise, stopped flashing after sunrise

content.detailedDescription: In the late 70s early 80s riding in a van about daybreak, myself and 4 of my band mates were on the way back to atl. ga. from a show we had done. i was in the back of the van when i heard one of the guys say , look at that star or light, i cant remember which, is following us. i went to the front of the van and looked out and saw a bright lite that appeared to be following us. i explained to them that it just appeared that way because we were doing about 60 miles an hour. we continued to watch for several minutes and by this time it was completely daylight. no stars in the sky except this bright light. that's when i started watching real close. it appeared to be stationary but still looked like it was following us if that makes sense. this had gone on for about 30 minutes. without warning the light as i will call it, dropped down about tree level and accelerated very fast ahead of us. at this point i knew it wasn't just a star in the sky. it appeared to move very fast effortlessly and at some times dropped below tree level. we could only see it through the trees. all this time that went by, about 50 minutes, we never saw another vehicle or person other than ourselves. just as fast as it appeared, it disappeared. just seconds after it disappeared, we started seeing cars and other vehicles. we were all pretty freaked out, so we pulled over and talked about what we had seen. i only told a few people in my life about this for fear of them thinking i was crazy. i was so thankful i had several other people with me or i wouldn't have believed it myself. over the years i lost contact with most of those guys, except one. we have remained good friends over all these years, and still to this day we talk about that mourning on the back roads of southern alabama. he says he doesn't discuss it with anyone but me because he knows i saw the same thing he saw. one thing i forgot to mention, its been 30 years. about 15 or 20 minutes after we first noticed this object, we pulled over on the side of the road, got out of the van and just looked at the object. it looked like a bright star, but only a few hundred yards in the sky. at that time, it never moved. just sat there. what was strange to us at the time was, no clouds, no stars in the sky, and it was completely daylight by this time. not until we saw it accelerate past us through the trees that we knew something wasn't normal. i never have been able to explain to myself what i saw.
content.summary: Myself and 4 other people observed a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Walking west and saw what looked like contrails but very short and realized it was a hollow cylinder that was illuminated on the 12 and 6 o'clock edges reflecting the setting sun. the object took up 1.5" of the sky. it was at approx. 7,000' moving right to left or nne to sw or ssw however, every 15 seconds it changed direction 90 degrees to the right (west) then back to the left (south) again and repeated these zig zag steps until it went out of sight.
an approx. guess is 300' or larger operating a slow to moderate speed (less than airliners but faster than cessna type craft.

oddly, the 90 degree changes of direction were not apparent until after it was moving in that new direction.  no shapes, wings, tail or gradual arc. no abrupt changes either, it is best described as a glide to the right then left at a consistent pace. 

a ring lof light encompassing the cylinder travelled from left to right and faded at the right end. it appeared to offer a form of propulsion as the lights moved directly proportional to the right as the  
object moved left.

the hollow light is best described as a partially lit florescent tube without the glass. the band of light (moving left to right) was not visible on the lee side of the hollow light. only on the side facing me was the light band visible.

silent and easily seen. there must be more people who saw this.

feelings and reactions: mixed, confused, analytical, recording and certain. 
how did i lose sight: it travelled over the gulf of mexico and eventually moved away from us.

addendum: i yelled and yelled for my neighbor to come out of the house and she came at the end of the sighting and her position is unfortunately inconclusive. she only saw one distant turn and then it faded out. 
this is very real and not a mistaken id, i am a professional ocean and celestial observer with 60 years of experience and i am positive of what i saw. this thing (?) was/is not man made.
content.summary: Hollow cylinder energized with moving band from left to right

content.detailedDescription:
I was pulling into my mother drive way, it was dark and the stars were very bright that night. in denver the nights are never as bright as they are in denver so i always like to look up and see the stars while in lamar.
as i drove the car into the drive way, i shut off the car and got out. the first thing i did was look up at all the stars, right off i noticed a very bright light slowly heading east toward the horizon, it was odd cause i didn't see any blinking lights that a plane would have, i heard no noise at all. i was mesmerized by the object cause it was silent and heading very fast toward the east. then i also noticed a air liner approaching from the ne at a very high altitude, i new it was a plane cause i could see the blinking lights in it. i noticed that the airlines was about to pass right over the bright object and as i was looking at the object, it just disappeared. like it turned off the light. the object had to be less than a mile about me, cause the plane was at least 25,000 ft and the plane was barely visible, yet the object appeared close and well underneath the airliner. i could hear the engines of the plane at that height, and yet i heard nothing from the object. 
the object was life sailing in the sky, smooth, silent and in a straight line
going very fast. i was in the us navy and have seen fighters, helicopters and blimps. this object was neither of them. after the object disappeared i continued to watch the sky, even after the airliner was out of sight, the object never illuminated again.
it was the st strangest thing i have ever saw.........
content.summary: Sighted object above me, no sound, heading east, then noticed airliner about to pass over object, object disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Driving, already told my story to a woman from mufon, i lost any means of contacting her, i now have things...Idk,... some move and poke out of my skin i am very afraid, please help.
content.summary: I already spoke with a woman from mufon the entire story, i now suffer horribly from "morgellons so i think it's called as well as living tiny things that poke out from my skin and i cannot pull them all out like it's connected to something bigger.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't really remember the exact month, sometime in the winter/spring of 1994. i was driving from dayton, tn to work in chattanooga, tn.. i usually left at around 7am every morning to get to work by 8 am.  i was driving on hwy 27, the main road to chattanooga from dayton and at about 7:30am (sun was starting to rise- dawn), i noticed a light hovering over the tree line just south east of my position, about a few miles north of soddy daisy. there were some cars on the road but not a lot. 

at first i thought it might be a helicopter. but as i got closer the lights seemed a bit... off.  i was traveling about 55 miles an hour and the object still was not moving.. as a matter of fact, it was so still, it was almost like it was sitting on a table or something. didn't adjust to wind or anything. so i kept my eyes on it and as i got closer i notice that the lights seemed to be triangular in shape.. probably about 6 or so on the underbelly and the object itself was shaped like a triangle.. the color of object looked dark, maybe black, probably due to sun not being up yet.. i didn't seen any blades like a helicopter would have, nor any kind of engine or exhaust. it just sat there. when i passed it up, i looked back in my rear view mirror and it was still there. didn't move at all. and it stayed there until i passed the point where i couldn't see it or the trees anymore. 

i mentioned it to my family and we really tried to explain it away.. again, helicopter was the only thing it could be, but it wasn't. i am 85% sure. i am a very analytical person. i tried to take in as much detail as i could and really couldn't explain what it was. if it were today, i might say it kind of looked like a stealth f-117 fighter but without fins or any protruding parts, and those don't hover.

i remember it like it was yesterday. it was strange and interesting at same time. if it was a ufo, then i feel honored to have seen one.
content.summary: Saw triangle like object hovering over treetops to my left (se), i was driving on hwy 27 going south towards chattanooga to go to work.

content.detailedDescription: We had just came home from watching the new super man movie and r family and friends were sitting outside waiting for my brother to start the fireworks. my husband looks to his left and sees a glowing red orange light and i say omg is that a firework and he says no i think ot is a air craft and as we start looking at it we notice it is not a airplane or firework it is nothing like we have ever seen. so after video taping it on his phone for a while it just disappears. we have seen a lot of strange activity lately and we live by he airport.I have lived here my whole life and never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Looked like a ball of light
